name: Eccentric Exploits! PbtA TTRPG Expansion
description:
Make your adventures even more thrilling with Eccentric Exploits!, the extraordinary expansion to the Thrilling Adventures! role-playing game.  In this guide you’ll find all kinds of helpful material to include elements of Steampunk, Weird Science, and Cthulhu Horror into your adventures!

Includes the following:

  • Overview of Steampunk, Weird Science, and Cthulhu genres
  • Source material for each genre, including settings, forces, and villains
  • Reference material suggestions and tips for running the genres
  • 6 new playbooks
  • Original artwork by Nataly Zhuk

Note: Though the 6 playbooks contained herein are useable on their own, you should really get  the base game, Thrilling Adventures!
